attributes.action: scrap lockdown, get on with our lives as normal
attributes.additional_details: its wasting time, nearly 9 months of our lives down the drain because boris is a dafty and cant turn up on time to his own meetings.
attributes.background: get rid of lockdown, get rid of the fake statistics and get back to business as usual

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
